title: Manage your Single Payment Scheme online

details.description: Apply for agricultural payments from the farming subsidy scheme
details.more_information:
RPA Online lets you:

  • apply for your annual subsidy
  • download your pre-filled SPS application
  • check and amend your application before you submit it
  • track an existing application
  • view your claim and entitlement statements
  • update your contact details

Contact the RPA customer service centre if you have any questions about your application.

RPA customer service centre
CSC@rpa.gsi.gov.uk
0845 603 7777

Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland have their own single payment schemes. Find more information on how to apply below:

  • Wales: Single Payment Scheme

  • Northern Ireland: Single Farm Payment Scheme

  • Scotland: Single Farm Payment Scheme: notes for guidance

You can also manage your Single Payment Scheme online in Scotland using the Rural Payments Online service.
details.introduction: Use Rural Payments Agency (RPA) Online to apply for your farming subsidy under the Single Payment Scheme (SPS).
